"A young boy who feels like an outcast discovers an alien in his backyard and befriends it, sparking his sense of wonder and imagination as they embark on a journey of discovery together."
"A scientist and a journalist team up to study an alien in the backyard of a suburban household, leading to a high-stakes showdown with the government."
"A group of teenagers accidentally stumble upon an alien in their backyard and must team up to protect it from being kidnapped by a shadowy organization."
"A family discovers an alien in their backyard and soon becomes divided when they discover the true nature of the alien's agenda."
"An alien finds itself stranded in a suburban yard and must navigate human society to find a way to survive."
